name: B.E.S. Plate Core
text:
2 "B.E.S." monsters /n When this card is Special Summoned: Place 3 counters on this card. Cannot be destroyed by battle. When this card battles an opponent's monster, remove 1 counter from this card at the end of the Damage Step. If you cannot, destroy this card. /nIf a "B.E.S." monster battles a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage. 
You can Normal Summon "B.E.S." monsters to your Zones this card points to without Tributing. (Quick Effect): You can activate this effect; "Boss Rush" Spell Cards you control have their effects negated until the End Phase.
